title: Enjoy all the amenities the City of Cleveland has to offer!
posting_body: great Room offers floor to ceiling windows which provide breathtaking views of the Flats!

Additionally, this luxurious condo is a corner unit that includes granite countertops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, hardwood and ceramic tile, in-suite laundry, a private balcony with great views of the city and a spacious open living concept.
A "Nest" smart home thermostat is included with this home.
The building also offers a state of the art fitness facility, concierge service and 24/7 security.
As an added bonus - there is an exclusive private bridge, accessible directly from your building to the "Superior Viaduct"!
This amenity provides the ability to grill out as well as direct access to live entertainment at Jacobs Pavilion.
